alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 2:16PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nye, west central White Pine and southeastern Eureka Counties through 245 PM PDT... At 215 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Pinto Summit, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pinto Summit and Pancake Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
